document_data.mainbody:
arrig Cymrych III was High King of the Moonshae Isles for a year at the turn of the 6 century DR.
He was a member of the Cymrych Dynasty and the son of his predecessor, High King Tuathal. His successor was his son, Colin Cymrych. His wife was Queen Abigail.
Carrig III assumed the throne of the High King in the , after the assassination of his father. He too was assassinated the next year.
Following his death, Queen Abigail appointed Edmund Kincaid as regent because Carrig IIIs heir, Colin, was only eight years old. Colin would eventually assume his fathers throne in the .
